title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Center         Visitor center at Fort Scott is located inside the historic post hospital. NPS Photo  Visitor Center-Post Hospital  Open All Year  April 1 to October 31 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. November 1 to March 31 8:30 a.m.-4:30 p.m.   Closures Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years Day.  Available Facilities Restrooms and bookstore in visitor center.  Audio-visual program in infantry barracks museum.
